Date: 2025-07-07 12:03
Subject: Notification: Migration D3 share drives from On-premise server to Azure D3 server
--------------------------------------------------
 

 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

Migration of following file shares from D3-fileserver to Azure fileserver VMAZ-UAEN-FS2 is completed.

 

Click here to view the full list of current share statuses <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/a/solutions/articles/52000129429?language=en> 

 

Kindly find the instructions to check the currently map drive.

 

Using Command Prompt:

*	Open Command Prompt as an administrator.
*	Type net use and press Enter.
*	A table will display, showing the local drive letter and the corresponding remote network path. 

 

Using File Explorer:

*	Open File Explorer (Windows key + E).
*	Select "This PC" in the left pane.
*	The mapped network drives will be listed under "Network locations". 

 

If you are unable to view your shared folder after migration, please follow the steps below to reconnect:

________________________________

To regain access to your mapped drive:

chunks.text:
*	Open File Explorer (Windows key + E).
*	Select "This PC" in the left pane.
*	The mapped network drives will be listed under "Network locations". 

 

If you are unable to view your shared folder after migration, please follow the steps below to reconnect:

________________________________

To regain access to your mapped drive:

1.	Press Windows Key (ðŸªŸ) + R on your keyboard
2.	In the Run dialog box, type: \\vmaz-uaen-fs2\ <file://vmaz-uaen-fs2/>  and click OK
3.	A list of shared folders will appear â€” locate your specific folder
4.	Right-click the folder and select Map Network Drive
5.	Confirm or choose a Drive Letter (e.g., J:)
6.	Click Finish

 

Your shared folder will now appear under This PC in File Explorer.

 

We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For further support, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by
